With cooking comes diverse stories, and living in America has allowed me to build bridges between various cultures through the wide variety of food experiences available here.

See some of the stories behind my favorite foods here.

Food is one thing that can be transported from country to country, and because my grandma was able to bring her cooking from China, I have been able to enjoy her cooking and learn more about my own heritage by living with her.

My writing is super informal, so I hope @CarissaEats allows my viewers to casually enjoy food alongside me.
